about_the_game:
Game Description:

"Bagel" invites you to an exciting multiplayer online experience! In this competitive game set in a school environment, players take on the role of either Civilian or Enemy. The main objective of the game is for the Enemy to destroy civilians or for Civilians to eliminate the Enemy. Invite your friends or join a server and start this breathtaking adventure!

Main Features:

Immersive Multiplayer Experience: Play fun and competitive games with your friends or other players. Each match turns into a struggle based on Civilians developing tactics to stop the Enemy and the Enemy hunting civilians.

Surprise Enemy Selection: When the game starts, one of the players is selected as the Enemy and starts the game in the safe area. Other players must use all their strategies to stop the Enemy and survive.

Strategic Battle Mechanics: The enemy must shout when attacking. When he screams, he gradually runs out of breath. Civilians can deal damage when the enemy runs out of breath or stops shouting. However, when the Enemy screams, Civilians have no choice but to flee! This dynamic requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and work as a team.

Weapons and Upgrade Items: There are various attack and upgrade items in the game field. Each weapon has its own damage and weight. Players can gain an advantage by collecting these items and use them to defeat their opponents.

Five Different Main Classes: There are five different main classes: Hacker, Tramp, Rich, Influencer and Trainer. Each class differs in attributes such as agility, lung capacity, speed and health. Players can determine their strategies by choosing the class that best suits their play style.

Scoring System: You gain 10 points when you damage the enemy, but you lose 2 points when you take damage. When the enemy hits you, you lose 10 points and you gain 2 points. This scoring system provides a source of motivation to measure players' performance and move up the leaderboards.

Restart: When one side wins, they are returned to the lobby and the game can be restarted. This provides an opportunity for players to prepare for the next match and rethink their strategies.

"Bagel" offers a fun and exciting experience full of various strategies and surprises. Prepare yourself for this breathtaking school adventure and enjoy the game!
